full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA LA GTOR MA 'BUL TSUL MDOR BSDUS BSAM 'PHEL YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,(CES MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA LA GTOR MA 'BUL TSUL MDOR BSDUS BSAM 'PHEL YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA @016B 'DI NI TSOGS 'DON TU 'DZUGS PA'I CHED DANG RNAM DPYOD DANG SPOBS PA PHUL TU BYUNG BA AER TE NI GU SHR'I KUN DGA' DON SGRUB CES BYA BAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, YE SHES KYIS MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA DANG LDAN PA BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA SU MA TI MA nI PRADZNY'AS 'PHRAL DU BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA PHYOGS TU GNAS SKABS THAMS CAD DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG` 'GRO BA THAMS CAD GNAS SKABS SU BAR CHAD ZHI ZHING, MTHAR THUG @017A *, ,RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYI GO 'PHANG MYUR TU THOB PAR GYUR CIG ,)
